text: CLOSE The royal wedding obsession is real! But are you obsessed enough to wake up at the crack of dawn just to catch a glimpse of the ceremony on tv. Susana Victoria Perez has more Buzz60 A cardboard cut - out display of Prince Harry and Meghan Markle sits outside a card shop in Windsor a few weeks before their wedding on May 19, 2018. ( Photo : Jack Taylor, Getty Images ) Americans will have no trouble finding Prince Harry and Meghan Markle's royal wedding playing on a screen nearby on Saturday. The real difficulty will be in avoiding it for those surly few who can't stand weddings or royals or both. But that lot can take themselves off to the wilderness with no Wi - Fi ; everybody else will settle themselves in front of their tellys or devices
